name: Cover Usage Tactics
description: Maximizing survival by effectively using cover in combat scenarios.

cards.title: Hard vs. Soft Cover
cards.description: Identifying effective cover options in different combat scenarios.
cards.bulletpoints: Recognize bullet-resistant vs. bullet-penetrable surfaces, use depth perception, avoid exposing limbs

cards.title: Dynamic Cover Transitioning
cards.description: Moving between cover positions while minimizing exposure.
cards.bulletpoints: Use short, controlled sprints, time movement with distractions, stay unpredictable
